adjectives.description: autocratic (comparative more autocratic, superlative most autocratic)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to autocracy or to an autocrat; absolute; holding independent and arbitrary powers of government.
examples: In recent years, the prime minister has become increasingly autocratic.

entries.meaning: (derogatory) Of or pertaining to the manner of an autocrat.
examples: Despite his lack of actual authority, his autocratic demeanour annoyed many of his colleagues.
